description.brief: The Bayesian Filtering Library (latest) with Eigen matrix class

package.description: This package contains a recent version of the Bayesian Filtering Library (BFL), distributed by the Orocos Project. Instead of the default Boost ublas library it uses Eigen for matrix operations.
package.author: Klaas Gadeyne, Wim Meeussen, Tinne Delaet and many others. See web page for a full contributor list. ROS package with Eigen matrix library support maintained by Johannes Meyer.
